title: Australia v India: fourth men’s Twenty20 international – live
summary: The T20 series is currently tied 1-1 as the two sides prepare for their crucial penultimate match. Martin Pegan will provide updates throughout the game. Fans can expect an exciting showdown to determine the series lead.

title: Bank of England to make ‘finely balanced decision’ on whether to cut interest rates at midday – business live
summary: Analysts are speculating that the Bank of England (BoE) may lower interest rates in today's meeting. This possibility arises amidst ongoing economic and financial developments. Stay tuned for real-time updates on the outcome and its potential impact.

title: Inquest finds German backpacker Simone Strobel killed by homicide - but can’t say who attacker was
summary: The latest inquest has overturned earlier findings of a "very strong suspicion" regarding a potential connection between a member of Strobel's traveling party and her death near a Lismore campground. This new ruling contradicts previous conclusions drawn in the case. Investigations into Strobel's death continue as authorities seek clarity on the circumstances surrounding it.

title: Death by Lightning review – absolutely nobody plays losers like Matthew Macfadyen
summary: The Succession actor delivers an outstanding performance in a captivating historical miniseries. His role as the assassin who killed the U.S. president in 1881 showcases his exceptional talent. This portrayal elevates his craft to new heights.

title: How Tesla shareholders could make Elon Musk the world’s first trillionaire
summary: Shareholder votes on a $1 trillion pay package will be counted on November 6. The package includes additional milestones beyond just increasing the company’s market cap. This proposal reflects a broader approach to compensation linked to overall company performance.
